actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 210 of the Flood Control Act of 1968.

summary.text: States that no provision of law enacted after the date of enactment of this Act authorizing or otherwise relating to the collection of special recreation use fees for the use of sites, facilities, equipment, or services furnished at Federal expense, shall have any application to public recreation areas located at lakes and reservoirs under the jurisdiction of the Corps of Engineers, United States Army.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 210 of the Flood Control Act of 1968.
